title: The Others (Short) (2016)
description: Great example of slitscanning in this trippy short by Japanese filmmaker Hiroshi Kondo. From Kondo, "When you are in the crowd, it's absorbed by the energy of the big city, the noise of the city disappears, and you feel like you are alone in this city."
